about_the_game:
We don't know why the blocks started falling from the sky, or what is causing it. What we do know is that we need to stop it before our whole world is destroyed. We need a hero, are you that hero?

What is included in Early Access?

  • 10 single player campaign levels, including 2 boss levels
  • 7 multiplayer block battles
  • Ability to play local same screen PvP
  • Ability to use Remote Play Together for PvP
  • 32 selectable player skins
  • Support for keyboard and/or controllers

Game Mechanics

  • Catch enough blocks to unlock the next level before the floor is totally destroyed!
  • Blocks will destabilize the ground when hit
  • Clocks add more precious time
  • Bombs completely destroy whatever they hit
  • Lasers, well, are lasers!

Bosses

  • Each boss is different, with different ways to be defeated

Player Customization

  • Each player can choose between 32 selectable skins

Remote Play Together Block Battles

  • Supports Remote Play Together!
  • Invite your friends using Steam's built in multiplayer feature

Multiplayer Block Battles

  • Go head to head with a friend using a shared keyboard or controllers
  • The player with the most blocks wins
  • The player with the most wins gets additional bragging rights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-integrated GPU with at least 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Quad-Core or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-integrated GPU with 3GB+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A unique, fast-paced platformer where only you can save the world from total destruction.
